document_data.mainbody:
Pitney Junior Lannon was a human inhabitant of the village of West Harbor on the Sword Coast North in the late 14 century DR.
As a child, Pitney Junior Lannon was much taller than his peers. He liked to appear tough and serious. He had short dark-brown hair and dark blue eyes.
Pitney Junior was a son to Ginni Lannon and Pitney Lannon, two soldiers and defenders of West Harbor. He had several younger siblings, including Kyl, Kiri, and Kaye Lannon, as well as two much older siblings.
After the , soon after the Mere of Dead Men was briefly consumed by a short but deadly conflict known as the Second War of the Shadow, Kyls parents volunteered to go on a rescue mission to retrieve the village mage, Tarmas, from the lair of black dragons Voaraghamanthar and Waervaerendor. Pitney Junior was still too young to understand the danger, but he was left in charge of his younger siblings, a job that he took seriously.
